subtitle: water is as the humanitarian who does
not act for praise or acceptance but
rather acts from a place of genuine love
and care for those it serves
this is the work that water performs it
seeks the low place and nourishes all
things beneath and above it without
desire for recompense
water does its work well without seeking
reward because it contains and sustains
all things
it has been said that water is life and
life does not seek payment for there is
no need to seek that which is already
possessed by it life found the rewards
of its actions in accomplishing them
when work becomes a source of Joy a
sustainable career has been found for
the soul to pursue in the same way may
each of us practice The Virtuous
attributes found within these pages and
let go of our attachment for a reward
let us instead be satisfied with the
good work we do knowing that if we only
ever do right just to receive a reward
then the right thing done becomes
selfishness
